name: Star Endurance
description:
Instructions:

1. Use W,A,S,D for movement 2.Use mouse to rotate 

3. Left click to fire

4. Green color powerups replenish health 

5. Red color powerups shoots a barrage of bullets while red square next to green health bar is active. 

Enjoy!! 

(PS: Try to survive for 60 minutes to get to the secret message )
